name: semanaagilizeiestudos
description: Testes realizados do curso semana agilizei

scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
scripts.cypress:run:mobile: npx cypress run allure:clear --config viewportWidth=411, viewportHeight=823 allure:report
scripts.cypress:run: npx cypress run allure:clear --config video=false --env allure=true --browser chrome allure:report
